testcase.name: Successful checkout of Adidas shoes
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Nopecomerce homepage...............................passed When the user clicks the signpage...........................................passed Then the user enters a valid username & password............................passed And the user clicks the login button and be on the home page................passed Then the user select the shoes product page from apparel flyout.............passed And the user select the Adidas shoes........................................passed Then the user selects size and click on add t cart..........................passed Then the user should able to see success message............................passed And the user clicks on the shopping cart link...............................passed Then the user select the T&C check box and clicks the checkout button.......passed And the user enters the shipping details....................................passed Then the user clicks on the continue buttons................................passed And the user should able to see order success message.......................passed Then the user clicks on the orde completed continue button..................passed
